title: CaroO Pro (Dashcam & OBD)
summary: The best vehicle dashcam with OBD support on your phone.
developerAddress:
(13320) 경기도 성남시 수정구 성남대로 1182 올레서비스드오피스 6층
전화: 070-8264-0806
Fax: 031-752-8699
description: Market leading dashcam and eco-driving assistant with OBD!Experience the stable background operation as well as no gaps between recorded files on Android 4.1 or higher devices!- Video dashcam supporting resolution and quality control up to full HD (1920x1080),- Camera exposure and focus control (depending on capabilities of phones),- Auto file deletion for normal/emergency video, - Emergency report via SMS, call and YouTube upload,- Car monitoring with connection of ELM327 compatible OBD dongles, - RPM, Speed, Battery voltage, coolant temperature, Baro pressure, and many more data (depending on cars),- Fuel-cut, eco-drive level, harsh acceleration/brake, idling indicator,  - Auto launch and termination options, - Co-working with Android Wear devices for notification and control  We recommend smartphones with Android 4.0 or higher, but most smartphones with Android 2.2 or higher are supported too. Android 2.2 or lower devices will not be officially supported from CaroO v2.3.0.  Before your purchase, please use the free version, CaroO Free Driving Recorder, in advance.If you have any problems or difficulties to use this app, please use the log button on the main screen and send log files to us.
descriptionHTML:
Market leading dashcam and eco-driving assistant with OBD!

Experience the stable background operation as well as no gaps between recorded files on Android 4.1 or higher devices!

- Video dashcam supporting resolution and quality control up to full HD (1920x1080),
- Camera exposure and focus control (depending on capabilities of phones),
- Auto file deletion for normal/emergency video,
- Emergency report via SMS, call and YouTube upload,
- Car monitoring with connection of ELM327 compatible OBD dongles,
- RPM, Speed, Battery voltage, coolant temperature, Baro pressure, and many more data (depending on cars),
- Fuel-cut, eco-drive level, harsh acceleration/brake, idling indicator,
- Auto launch and termination options,
- Co-working with Android Wear devices for notification and control


We recommend smartphones with Android 4.0 or higher, but most smartphones with Android 2.2 or higher are supported too. Android 2.2 or lower devices will not be officially supported from CaroO v2.3.0. Before your purchase, please use the free version, CaroO Free Driving Recorder, in advance.

If you have any problems or difficulties to use this app, please use the log button on the main screen and send log files to us.
comments: Love the app and have had very few problems with it. It's useful to monitor engine codes,  driving styles,  and the idiots on the road around you. The problems are clarity of image and exposure.  I have difficulty reading license plates (auto focus issue? Not sure what the difference is with the 3 auto focus settings) when reviewing images to report carpool violators and the manual adjustment for tint is impractical in changing conditions.  When it's cloudy and there is a sun break the image ends up washed out badly and I don't think this adjustment should be messed with while driving.   Would buy again

I do like the video capability and features of the app. I have an issue with the OBD2 connection and the fact that when I sent the log information in via the app, the email was bounced back. If I connect the app to the OBD2, as soon as the app boots into the video screen the engine dies.

I cannot seem to be able to disable event detection sensativity, it is set very low but every time I hit even a small bump in the road it records emergency video also the GPS does not match the recording if I'm stopped it shows the vehicle moving several seconds before it actually starts.

Very good. Excellent all rounder, saves having a dash cam app and OBDLink running at same time. Only issues is white balance whilst recording is either non-existent or extremely slow. I'd also like a widget with even just 2 buttons, one to return to app and another to protect recording, the floating button is to small to safely use. If it had a parking mode also, THAT would make it a top 3 app. Awesome work! Highly recommended, and don't skimp out and buy the pro version!

I've had this for over a year. It is a solid app, doing what it says on the box although it is a little flakey when confronted with cheap Bluetooth ODB II devices. Sadly, it don't work no more. It and Android O (8.0) don't get along.
Works great after tweaking the settings a little. E.g. focus set to infinity, after finding the AF1 and AF2 getting confused when raining. Great app.
